alert.note: Alert for Harvey (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 5:33PM CDT until May 30 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Harvey County in south central Kansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 533 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Burrton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Halstead, Sedgwick and Burrton. This includes Interstate 135 near Mile Marker 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
